plain: The user's favourite genre is likely to be fiction, as all of the books mentioned are novels. The user's favourite kind of plot is likely to be character-driven, as all of the books mentioned focus on the development of their protagonists. The user's favourite setting is likely to be contemporary, as all of the books mentioned take place in the modern era. The user's favourite writing style is likely to be narrative, as all of the books mentioned are told through the use of prose. The user's favourite length is likely to be novel-length, as all of the books mentioned are full-length novels. The user's favourite topic is likely to be coming-of-age, as all of the books mentioned deal with the themes of growing up and finding one's place in the world. The user's favourite pacing is likely to be slow and steady, as all of the books mentioned take their time in developing their stories. The user's favourite narrative structure is likely to be third-person omniscient, as all of the books mentioned are told from a detached perspective that allows the reader to see all aspects of the story. The user's favourite themes are likely to be identity, belonging, and self-discovery, as all of the books mentioned deal with these universal human experiences.
